name: RelaxationBowl
0:
”Alexa, Ask Relaxation Bowl to ring bells”
”Alexa, Open Relaxation Bowl”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxation bowl
des:
Singing bowls are used for meditation, music, relaxation, personal well-being.
Also known as Tibetan Singing Bowls, rin gongs, Himalayan bowls or suzu gongs.
Enjoy these high fidelity bell sounds

Examples:
loop on
loop off
open Relaxation Bowl
pause
resume
good-bye
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
